price: Sila akkamitti akka Rabbiin fakkeenya godhe hin arginee? jechi gaariin akka muka gaarii hundeen ishee gadi dhaabbataa ta’ee, dameen ishee samii keessatti ta’eetti.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا كَلِمَةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ كَشَجَرَةٖ طَيِّبَةٍ أَصۡلُهَا ثَابِتٞ وَفَرۡعُهَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kashajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā thābitun wafarʿuhā fī al-samāi
